title: SCOTUS Privacy Rights was overwritten with the new title Privacy Rights Statement

content.question: Which of the following statements is true regarding the right to privacy?

choices.label: The right to privacy has not been the topic of Supreme Court cases.
The right to privacy is explicitly named in the Bill of Rights.
The right to privacy is not explicitly named in the Constitution.
The right to privacy has been acknowledged as a core American value.

content.answer: The right to privacy is not explicitly named in the Constitution.
